```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
enrollment <- read_excel("raw_data/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_2-10-2021.xlsx", skip = 3)

enrollment %>%
  group_by(`Instructor Full Name`) %>%
  summarize(total_student = sum(Total)) %>%
  arrange(desc(total_student)) %>%
  ##  clean_names() %>%
  slice(1:5)
```
